method.text: Pour a third of the melted butter into a heavy based ovenproof non-stick frying pan. Heat through for 1 min.

Arrange a third of the sliced potatoes over the bottom of the pan, overlapping each other. Sprinkle over a third of the leek and ham. Season. Sprinkle over a little of the thyme. Repeat to form three layers, pouring a little cream in between each layer. Finish with a layer of potatoes brushed with the melted butter. Sprinkle on seasoning and chopped thyme.

Place over a medium heat for 5 min or until the underside becomes golden brown. Press down firmly with a non-stick spatula to compact. Cover and cook in the oven for 40-45 min or until potatoes are tender.
Transfer the pie to a warmed serving plate and serve immediately in slices.
